name: OnlyOne
description:
GMTK 2019 Game Jam

Only One

You wake in the school, and all in a sudden, are surrounded by lots of zombies. Can you escape?

 You have to use weapons around you to defeat zombies. You can only take one weapon at a time, and the weapon can only hit enemy once. Both enemy and you will be killed with only one hit. 

Control:
    WASD:  movement
    MouseMovement: Camera Rotation
    Left Click: Attack
